alert.note: Alert for Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 2:21AM EST until January 10 at 2:02PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Maryland... Seneca Creek at Dawsonville affecting Northwest Montgomery zone. For the Seneca Creek...including Dawsonville...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Seneca Creek at Dawsonville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Portions of the Seneca Creek Greenway are flooded. A small portion of Berryville Road west of Darnestown begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:50 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 2.4 feet, or 5.1 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late tonight. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Tue Tue Tue Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7AM 1PM 7PM Stg Time Date Seneca Creek Dawsonville 7.5 2.4 Tue 1 am 2.2 2.4 3.4 7.9 7am Wed &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1030 AM EST.
